Aug 11th 2021

Overseas Passenger Terminal

Bringing Artists & Brands together
to share, learn & be inspired.

Scroll down

About The Event.

What if we brought artists and brands side by side for a single moment to share, learn and be inspired? That’s the premise of the Artist X Brand Summit, a first of its kind event designed to generate conversation and spark innovative new ways of thinking about collaboration in music culture today. Please join us for a new kind of event experience with some of the most creative & inspiring minds in culture and marketing today.

Our theme for 2021 Know your voice in music.

To connect with fans and make a meaningful impact in culture, you need a voice. This is true for artists who have always harnessed their voice for change, but in an ever-fragmented marketing world it couldn’t be truer for brands too - who need to know their own voice in music in order to connect and grow their own audience.

Music has never been more powerful than today.
Do you know what your voice is yet?

Apply For Tickets.

Our Summit is a FREE event for all in attendance.

The day is split into two moments. Our day session is for artists, marketers & the music industry. Our evening session will be open to fans to enjoy a very special live music moment with today’s top artists.

  • Afternoon session + After party
  • After party only

Our Agenda.

9:30am
Panel

Nothing Killed the Video Star

James Griffiths
Bring
   
When ‘Video killed the radio star’ became the first music video on then new channel, MTV - music would never be the same again. Fast forward 40 years and this still holds true. Why then, in an era of shorter form content and diminishing attention spans does the Music Video still engage fans the world over? We explore what makes them such a powerful cultural medium, accelerated by the pandemic and an at-home engaged audience base.
